trends: There have been no other sightings in Avon
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: small white lights,green lights with straight offs
divs: Sighting DetailsThere were around 25 white pinpoint lights that ping-ponged in the sky in onegeneral area. Then a green pinpoint light appeared and a green beam shotperfectly straight to the ground. A few seconds later another green lightappeared and a green beam shot horizontilly across the sky. After a few moreminutes of the white lights bouncing around, they just disappeared.
